Desc.entry: Provides language tuition and translation in Catalan, Czech, Dutch, French, German, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latin, Spanish, Polish, Swedish, Thai and Russian plus many more. Pre GCSE crammer courses and 'bridge the gap' courses between GCSE and A-Level in French, German and Spanish. Tutors have BA/equivalent qualification or are native speakers. Individual tuition in own home or small groups, daytimes and evenings by arrangement. Kids club in French for children aged 3-8 years held at Endcliffe Methodist Church, Ecclesall Road, Hunters Bar, Sheffield S11 8QH on Saturdays 11am-12noon.
